title: Can't receive email
content: Haven't received email for 6 days now. Checked everything and all is configured correctly. Nothing has been recently changed or updated. I can send email but not receive any, Went through a web-based server and all my email was there, just nothing through thunderbird.
creator: nassaugop

title: 115.2.2 (64-Bit): After Update -> mail folders (sent) gone
content:
To start with: this is the worst period bloated period version period ever period .. and I am more as effin angry.

Since I couldn´t send mails through gmails smtp, I was forced to update TB today. Not to mention that the layout with line height, line spacing etc is just a nightmare and makes working with it a complete mess (WTF is doing that, to program defaults regarding this?!), from 4 of 9 accounts the sent folders are completly gone and this is a production environment. Sure, backups are available.

Addons deactivated, restart done twice. How can I retrieve the Sent folders back with their content?

(Sorry, I am just so effin pissed that I had to vent, else I´m exploding)
creator: AngryDude

title: Unified toolbar can use some additional features.
content: I really like the new unified toolbar concept on tbird supernova (115.2.1). I usually hide the (generally useless) system titlebar, but I would like to see some title string text show up on the unified toolbar. In fact, I would also like to fold in the tabbar into this unified toolbar as well. So, the features I would like to see in unified toolbar are - ability to add arbiturary text string - ability to add name of the current tab - menu item to select from list of existing tabs (so that I can hide the tabbar altogether)
creator: myoo60

title: Printing function on Thunderbird has suddenly gone wrong
content:
My father has used Thunderbird for 3 years fine. 10 days ago, the printing went wrong.

The only printer visible is Print to pdf - the local printer is not an option.

Also, once he opens Thunderbird, the printer function on Excel and Word vanishes; i.e. befofe he opens Thunderbird, he can print from Excel and Word; right after he opens Thunderbird, 'No printer installed' is the message on those programmes.

Can anyone please explain why, and give a solution?

He has version 102.15.1 on Windows 11.

Thanks
creator: goldiedr

title: v115.2.2-64-bit Windows: Subscribed subfolders are no longer accessible
content: The update to v115.2.2 in 64 bit windows appears to be a step backwards. My subscribed subfolders on my IMAP server are no longer visible. When I select File->Subscribe, I can see them, and they are all checkmarked, but they are not visible in the Folder pane. Also, the mouse scroll wheel has stopped working! I cannot use the scroll wheel to scroll through the Mail pane or the Folder pane, nor can I scroll in an email window. Please advise how to go back to a version of Thunderbird that actually works.
creator: tony259

title: 115 seems to be a step backward
content: Without thinking I let version 115 install over 108. Now my email seems nearly unusable (or at least not at all friendly): upon opening the selected message for any given email account seems to be selected at random, the junk filters suddenly decided that I was not allowed to send a test message to myself (trying to troubleshoot other problems) and my mail accounts and nntp accounts are intermingled seemingly at random. I really need to have mail first, nntp second to maintain sanity. Is there some way to attack this?
creator: jmcgaw47

title: Actualice a Thunderbird 115.2.2 (32-bit) y no veo mas las carpetas unificadas
content: Al actualizar a Thunderbird 115.2.2 (32-bit) no veo mas las carpetas unificadas. De hecho le hago clic en Ver - Carpetas - Carpetas Unificadas y no solo que no hace nada sino que "se deselecciona" al cerrarse el menu.
creator: corsariodance

title: Email incorrectly identified as subthread to a different message
content: Emails in a folder are incorrectly getting identified as a subthread to a different email. In the attached image, the email from Cindy "Disclosures Avon" is identified as a subthread to the Chase email "Superior Homes Visit". I can fix it by sending the subthread back to the inbox and then returning it to the folder, but... well, I shouldn't have to do that.
creator: rick163

title: Mozilla Thunderbird - Odeslat později
content:
Dobrý den, používám nejnovější verzi Thunderbirdu. Nainstaloval jsem si doplněk "Odeslat později". Při pokusu odeslat email později, je utomaticky nastaveno odeslat za 5 minut. Při změně datumu o tři dny později a zvolení " Dát do pošty k odeslání" vyskočí okno s textem

'Kliknutí na tlačítko „Dát do „Pošty k odeslání“ vloží zprávu okamžitě do vaší „Pošty k odeslání“, takže u ní NEBUDE naplánováno odeslání v určitý čas. Pro odeslání naplánovaném v určitý čas klikněte (po vložení platného času odeslání) na tlačítko „Odeslat přibližně v“ v zeleném rámečku. Opravdu chcete zprávu vložit do vaší „Pošty k odeslání?"

V poště k odeslání jsou emaily, ale ani u jednoho nejde kliknout na "Odeslat pozděj" a chybí tam "Odeslat přibližně". Doplněk je nefunkční.
creator: rostislav.bartosek

title: User interface suddenly changed, we're in distress
content:
We have 4 PCs at work. On one of them the whole Thunderbird interface changed. I tried to fix it, even re-install the whole thing but it's still broken. There's no button to create a new mail, no button to download new messages, the search bar glitched up and to the middle, EVERYTHING moved a bit more up and to the left leaving empty space on the right and even the logo is weird and looks like a completely different program!

It all looks off and so confusing, especially for my (much MUCH) older coworkers. For now we're just using other computers but I'm afraid that if it's an update and not a glitch it will reach others as well. Adobe Acrobat at least had a button you could click to get back to the old look but I can't find anything like that here...

I'm so frustrated, it's like 5th product/website in the last few months that gets broken like this... I don't want to be called constantly for every thing regarding e-mails. And on top of that I had to create an account here because just sending a bug report or even just feedback directly to people who work on the changes is not an option unless you just throw a post and hope another user answers it! Or idk, maybe there is such option but burried somewhere deep on this website.

Please help, I'm desperate...
creator: a_zero

title: Remover atalhos de teclado no Thunderbird
content: Bom dia, Podem por favor ajudar-me a remover os atalhos de teclado [Shift+c], [a], [r]e[o] no Thunderbird 102.15.1 (32-bit) para Windows 10? Obrigado desde já Diamantino Freitas
creator: dfreitas11

title: Google Contacts has stopped synchronising to Thunderbird
content:
I have been using Thunderbird address book synchronized to Google contacts but it has stopped synchronizing this summer. I had been able to find new contacts in contacts.google.com add a label then later I found that they had synchronized and were in my various instances of Thunderbird.

This was working fine in the winter this year. But I added a contact this way in the summer and the contact has not appeared in any instance of Thunderbird Address book.

I am using Thunderbird 102.14.0 with Windows 7 and 10. But Linux may be using an older version Ubuntu is on version 102.15.0. The issue seems to have arisen this summer.

I disabled a few years ago; TbSync, Cardbook, Google-4-TbSync, Provider-4-CALDAV & CARDDAV, when Thunderbird Address book started to work with Yahoo and Gmail address books.

The only add-on that I use now is LT for grammar and spell checking.
creator: a.h.lohmann

title: Email Data
content:
Hi folks. I have 4 email accounts. 3 are business accounts. The ones that are business accounts have emails that are probably years old. I've discovered that my mobile data is being used up by my email.

So my question is: When I download new emails, is it just the new email that is downloaded, or is it an updated file with the new email added to it?

As said, with the amount of emails that are stored would mean a full email file download would be extremely large.
creator: BigDingus

title: Nenačítá se mi vzdálený obsah v přijatých zprávách
content:
Dobrý den, stále se mi nenačítá vzdálený obsah (obrázky) v přijatých emailech ( z jedné konkrétní adresy). Podle Vaší nápovědi jsem si v Nastevení- Soukromí a zabezpečení zaklikla "Povolit vzdálený obsah ve zprávách", ale i po tomto "zakliknutí" mi stále chodí email ( z jedné konkrétní adresy) bez zobrazených obrázků. Používáme email od "gmail" a od seznamu. Když si email otevřu přímo v google a nebo na seznamu, tak je email vč. obrázků. Tak že to mám zablokované v Thunderbird, ale nemohu najít kede.

Moc děkuji. Přeji krásný den. Michaela Čermáková
creator: xshop

title: After updating Thunderbird to 115.2.2,  3 of my accounts do not show up under Inbox, Sent, etc.
content: After updating Thunderbird to 115.2.2, 3 of my accounts do not show up under Inbox, Sent, etc..This happens on 3 computers. When I click Get Messages it shows messages being downloaded. If there is not a fix, can I go back to an earlier version? The computers are Windows based. Two win 10 & One Win 7.
creator: dlawren2

title: Sfondo mail
content:
Non riesco a modificare sfondo mail. Ho chiesto aiuto qui. Molto gentilmente mi ha risposto NEXT, che ringrazio, scrivendomi:

""Quando componi un messaggio, nella barra degli strumenti di formattazione, ci sono due quadrati colorati di solito uno bianco sullo sfondo ed uno nero in primo piano. Facendo click su questo quadrati puoi cambiare il colore dello sfondo e del testo. Questo per il singolo messaggio.

Se vuoi usare lo stesso schema in tutti i messaggi vai in Tasto menu > Impostazioni > Composizione Togli il segno di spunta da Usa i colori predefiniti del lettore Poi immediatamente sotto personalizza i colori in Colore del testo e Colore di sfondo""

Ma il punto è che avevo già fatto passo passo quanto descritto da NEX, poi l'ho ripetuto, ma le impostazioni NON "rimangono" fisse, insomma NON si salvano!! Come fare?
creator: kingsun27

title: Can't send email message - encrypted passwords not supported
content:
Hi good day,

I'm having trouble with my Thunderbird app as I can't seem to send a message/email. I've tried troubleshooting by configuring the SMTP settings.

Go to Account Settings like in the previous step. Click “Outgoing server” in the left-hand tab. Make sure you’re using the 587 port, “None” in connection security, and “Normal” password.

And the 1st image is the error I receive

title: Thunderbird has become very slow to connect to my gmail account mailboxes
content:
For the last three days Thunderbird has been very slow to open my Inbox, Sent Box, Bin, etc on my gmail account. (Other email accounts mailboxes are fast as usual). Gmail is my primary account. The spinning circle runs for quite a while (two or three minutes) as I attempt to open Inbox or Sent or Bin or whatever or move from one to another.

Sometimes when I empty the Bin and get the Emptied Bin confirmation, the cleared message reappears in the Bin again later.

Also I cannot now find either Options or Preferences within the Tools Menu (nor anywhere else either). Where is this now please ?

Any help would be much appreciated.
creator: joycembrett

title: Unstar in filter
content:
Hi,

I can set up a filter based on different conditions to add a star to the message. Unfortunately, I don't see the option to unstar. Do I miss something or there is no such functionality?

Regards, Zbyszek
creator: zbyszek4

title: unable to connect to server, server timeout
content:
A couple weeks ago I started to have Thunderbird problems with a server timeout or unable to connect. I could neither read or write messages. I've set up Thunderbird using the ports specified by my ISP (lmi.net) without fixing the problem. My provider says that I may be overloading the server for some reason, and the mail server is blocking my ISP address under the assumption that the overloading is a spam attack.

I've discovered that there is another generic mail client on my PC that was apparently installed when I upgraded to Windows 10. I remember being asked for my email address when I installed Windows 10, but never thought they were asking for client email installation.

Have you run across any problems like this?
creator: albanyguy
